ABOUT US We are on a mission to combat global loneliness - we believe that through meaningful, offline interactions with people, you can become happier, healthier, and less lonely. And we’re launching an app to help people with just that. Today, global loneliness is at epidemic levels, but how can you feel disconnected when you’re always connected through social media? As society is shifting from a “sharing” paradigm to “growing together”, social media is no longer making a cut. Doing things you actually enjoy and look forward to offline allows you to meet like-minded people. Having things in common makes it easier to grow together and brings happiness to your life through belonging to something. With our app, you can find your passion or help your peers with theirs - co-play, co-train, co-earn and grow together. Simply belong. https://www.belong-app.com/

JOB SUMMARY We are looking for a social media & community manager to support our content research and creation (writing and graphics/animation), social media community development and paid media activities for an exciting new app launch. You will be part of the go-to-market team, helping us to introduce the app to the UK market, develop our content strategy and grow the user base from 0 to millions. Exposure to all things marketing in a startup environment, product management, app analytics, social media is guaranteed! This is a fully remote, full time role. RESPONSIBILITIES Community management (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok) including: • Suggesting and writing content to promote the app • Researching key trends and popular hashtags • Engaging with members and non-members of the community via creative storytelling • Exploring potential collaboration opportunities with other accounts to expand our reach • Growing product user base and lead generation • Capturing product feedback and creating weekly reports • Monitoring assigned KPIs, providing ideas to improve them and weekly reporting across all channels • Participating in our brainstorming sessions and providing content and activation ideas to deliver on the product plan • Assisting our marketing team with paid media activities (paid social media and other digital marketing channels) SKILLS/REQUIREMENTS • Solid experience with key social media platforms (FB, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok) – from paid & organic points of view – content posting & management, campaign setup, optimisation, and reporting • Experience with community management and growing social media channels (engagement & followers), ideally within local sports or hobbies domains • Paid digital marketing experience (SEO/SEM and Social Media), including user acquisition campaigns • Partnerships/Business development experience, ideally within local sports or hobbies domains • Creativity – ability to come up with new ways to communicate our message, engage our community and build affinity • Native/fluent level English with high attention to detail, organised and resourceful - strong copywriting and design skills with the ability to adapt to different formats and channels • Good communication and interpersonal skills, ability to work remotely and independently • Figma, Miro, Photoshop, Canva, Google Analytics, Animation tools working knowledge

If you think you’d be a good fit, we would love to speak to you! Apply by submitting your CV and a short cover letter explaining why you're interested in this role.

PS. Feel free to join our waitlist here and like/share our social media channels as well – things are about to get interesting!

stories.text:
I am starting a new project - MagikBanner. An AI assisted banner image generator. I asked a few marketers where do they get banners and other graphics for their work. Some get it from inhouse graphic designers, but most create it themselves using various online and offline tools. Learning those tools can be tricky and it's also not a marketer's primary function to create graphics. Especially when you need to create same kind of images for various platforms in various sizes, it can be a time sink.

Hence, MagikBanner. You can just enter a few words, upload your logo if you wish and press a button and the service will generate a bunch of banner images automatically. It will automatically pick an image or pattern to be used as background, place the caption and logo where it sees fit and add a bunch of other effects and filters. you can select one of the options or generate more banners. Then whatever design you liked you can either tweak it more to your liking or get the design delivered in various sizes.

What kind of banners can be generated with MagikBanner?

Facebook and Twitter preview images Facebook and Twitter profile cover images Instagram stories Apple App store and Google Play Store preview images YouTube video thumbnails Blog post featured image Ad banners Pinterest images WhatsApp status images

And more.

Where does the AI come in? I plan on using GPT3 to detect the core theme of the banner and the theme will decide the colors, the fonts, placement of the objects, the image, the pattern. A banner for a CRM tool will have sophisticated business like look and feel, a banner for a cake shop will have informal and pleasing feel to it. Possibilities are endless.

Head out to MagikBanner.com and join the wait list to get updates on the progress and get notified when it launches.
